text: Golden Child (; abbreviated as GNCD or GolCha) is a South Korean boy band formed on 2017 by Woollim Entertainment. The group debuted on 28 August 2017 with their extended play, Gol-Cha!. Originally consist of eleven members, Park Jae-seok later departed from the group in January 2018. == References == ==Other websites== * * Social sites: FacebookTwitter (Global/Japan)Twitter (Korea)InstagramWeibo * Official channels: YouTubeVLiveDaum Cafe * Music sites: SpotifyiTunes/Apple Music Category:2017 establishments in South Korea Category:Musical groups established in 2017 Category:K-pop music groups Category:South Korean boy bands
title: Golden Child (band)
